dependencies.description: Extended pickling support for Python objects.
dependencies.name: py-cloudpickle

dependencies.name: py-jsonschema

dependencies.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.
dependencies.name: py-matplotlib

dependencies.description:
This package provides Python bindings for the Message Passing Interface
(MPI) standard. It is implemented on top of the MPI-1/MPI-2
specification and exposes an API which grounds on the standard MPI-2 C++
bindings.
dependencies.name: py-mpi4py

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
The hostlist.py module knows how to expand and collect hostlist
expressions.
dependencies.name: py-python-hostlist

dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-scipy

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description:
TensorBoard is a suite of web applications for inspecting and
understanding your TensorFlow runs and graphs.
dependencies.name: py-tensorboard

dependencies.description: TensorFlow is an open source machine learning framework for everyone.
dependencies.name: py-tensorflow

dependencies.description:
Tensors and Dynamic neural networks in Python with strong GPU
acceleration.
dependencies.name: py-torch

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

description:
Melissa is a file-avoiding, adaptive, fault-tolerant and elastic
framework, to run large-scale sensitivity analysis or deep-surrogate
training on supercomputers. This package builds the launcher and server
modules.
name: py-melissa-core

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system

variants.description: Install Deep Learning requirements with TensorFlow only
variants.name: tf

variants.description: Install Deep Learning requirements with Pytorch only
variants.name: torch
